EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to the responsible of triage to inform that a new injury case has been sent to him / her for his/her review as there is no non-compliance identified
EmailTemplate.name: 14 - New SLGSA case with no noncompliance to review and close
EmailTemplate.subject: A new injury associated to Provider {!Case.Provider_Name_For_Email_Merge__c} is ready to be closed.
